div.p: The histologic type codes can be taken either from ICD-O-3 morphology codes (including behavior suffix) or SNOMED CT neoplasm morphology codes. For primary cancers, the ICD-O-3 behavior suffix should be /1, /2, or /3. For secondary cancers, the ICD-O-3 code should be /6 or /9.

description.value: The histologic type codes can be taken either from ICD-O-3 morphology codes (including behavior suffix) or SNOMED CT neoplasm morphology codes. For primary cancers, the ICD-O-3 behavior suffix should be /1, /2, or /3. For secondary cancers, the ICD-O-3 code should be /6 or /9.
